house_listing.house_description: A boaters delight! Almost 1 acre on deep canal that leads to back bay & beyond! Minutes by boat to the outer banks of nc! 4 brs, 2.5 ba, lots of storage, garage, eat-in kitchen, living room w/wood stove insert in fp, laundry rm, some appliances, deck, shed, cul de sac, close to bases!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Boat Dock, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Club House, ColonialStyle, Fenced, Foyer, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
